scripts.pages:dev: npm run build && wrangler pages dev dist --ip 0.0.0.0
scripts.pages:deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.pages:deploy:preview: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.pages:deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --branch production
scripts.db:migrate: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply order_ieeja_orders_preview --local
scripts.db:migrate:preview: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply order_ieeja_orders_preview --remote
scripts.db:migrate:status: npx wrangler d1 migrations list order_ieeja_orders_preview --local
scripts.db:migrate:status:preview: npx wrangler d1 migrations list order_ieeja_orders_preview --remote
scripts.db:migrate:prod: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply order_ieeja_orders --remote
scripts.db:migrate:status:prod: npx wrangler d1 migrations list order_ieeja_orders --remote
scripts.db:pull: npm run db:pull:export && npm run db:pull:process && npm run db:pull:import
scripts.db:pull:force: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('./.wrangler/state', { recursive: true, force: true });" && npm run db:pull
scripts.db:pull:export: npx wrangler@latest d1 export order_ieeja_orders --remote --output backup.sql
scripts.db:pull:import: npx wrangler@latest d1 execute order_ieeja_orders --local --file backup.sql
scripts.db:sync:preview: npx wrangler@latest d1 export order_ieeja_orders_preview --local --output preview.sql && npx wrangler@latest d1 execute order_ieeja_orders_preview --remote --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS d1_migrations; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS orders; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS order_items; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS user_addresses; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS admin_config; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS products; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS products_new; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS orders_new; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS order_items_new;" && npx wrangler@latest d1 execute order_ieeja_orders_preview --remote --file preview.sql && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('preview.sql', { force: true });"
scripts.db:query:users: npx wrangler@latest d1 execute order_ieeja_orders --local --command "SELECT phone, role, status FROM users;"
scripts.db:query:users:remote: npx wrangler@latest d1 execute order_ieeja_orders --remote --command "SELECT phone, role, status FROM users;"
scripts.db:wipe:orders: npx wrangler d1 execute order_ieeja_orders --local --command "DELETE FROM order_items; DELETE FROM orders;"
scripts.db:wipe:orders:remote: npx wrangler d1 execute order_ieeja_orders --remote --command "DELETE FROM order_items; DELETE FROM orders;"
scripts.db:wipe:users: npx wrangler d1 execute order_ieeja_orders --local --command "DELETE FROM users WHERE role != 'admin';"
scripts.db:wipe:users:remote: npx wrangler d1 execute order_ieeja_orders --remote --command "DELETE FROM users WHERE role != 'admin';"
scripts.db:inspect: npx wrangler d1 execute order_ieeja_orders --local --command "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'; SELECT 'orders' as table_name, count(*) as count FROM orders UNION SELECT 'users', count(*) FROM users;"
scripts.logs:tail:preview: npx wrangler pages deployment tail --environment preview
scripts.logs:tail:prod: npx wrangler pages deployment tail --environment production
scripts.clean: node -e "['dist', '.wrangler'].forEach(dir => require('fs').rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }));"
